long_description: The Osprey Daylite daypack is an excellent addition to your gear collection. This durably constructed basic daypack has all the features needed to carry your daily necessities. Large panel loading main compartment opens wide for packing and unpacking and makes it easy to locate gear. Interior sleeve helps organize your stuff, be it a tablet or other goods. Mesh-covered back panel with slotted foam protects back from pack contents and breathes well. Tuck-away shoulder straps with breathable spacer-mesh backing have an integrated handle. If you want to carry a hydration reservoir there's a handy slot for it behind the back panel; reservoir sold separately. Front pocket with mesh organizer and key clip; side mesh bottle pockets. Osprey Daylite attaches to all Osprey AddOn?-series packs, including the Aether and Ariel backpacks and Pre-Fall 2012 Porter travel packs, all sold separately.
short_description: The Osprey Daylite daypack is an excellent addition to your gear collection. This durably constructed basic daypack has all the features needed to carry your daily necessities.
